description: Yuuta`s grandfather, he lives separately from his relatives and sees Yuuta on occasion. When he does he usually gifts his grandchild a toy gun as it brings him happiness. While he might come across as aloof and almost senile he is present. [spoiler="."]Most of the reason why he stays close it because he feels guilty for the shame that his son brought upon his family[/spoiler]
name: Yuuta no Sofu
